attachments.pdf.compliance.checklist.lin: Check here the PDF compliance checklist
attachments.pdf.compliance.checklist.tex:
To guarantee compliance, you should ensure that your PDF generator and resulting PDFs meet the following criteria:

• all fonts are embedded (exception: Base 14 fonts are accepted even if they are not embedded)
• the page size is A4 +/- 5% (PDF sizes up to 312 x 227 mm (A4 +5%) or 12.28 x 8.94" (letter + 5%) are accepted).
• the PDF is not encrypted
• it does not contain colour or greyscale images and drawings
• the PDF is Version 1.1 (or later)
• the PDF does not contain embedded OLE objects
• the PDF should not be electronically signed (exception: certified copies of priority documents that comply with the Administrative Instructions under the PCT, Part 7 and Annex F and may be digitally signed; they may only be filed via Online Filing or new online filing (CMS) - for further details see OJ EPO 2018, A94).
Note: US priority documents can be submitted in A4 format only.

If you are generating PDFs from paper documents using your company scanner you should adjust the settings of your scanner accordingly.

To help you verify whether the PDF document you intend to attach complies with these requirements, you can use WIPO's PDF conversion checker:

https://pct.wipo.int/DocConverter/pages/pdfValidator.xhtml

fees.payment.intention.tooltip:
Here you can indicate how and if you wish to pay for this submission.

Any payment will be carried out subsequently by separate means: The submission can be sent without payment. This payment can be done as a subsequent action after sending the submission.

Paid separately by other means: Attach evidence of a payment already done.

Pay online: Payments can be done via e.g., credit card, bank transfer and deposit account. You can perform the payment after signing the submission.

signatures.common.name: Common Name
submission.businessrule.delete: Submission in this status cannot be deleted
submission.businessrule.editing-form: A section of the submission is being edited. Please cancel or confirm to proceed
submission.basicfiliginfo.businessrule.d: A divisional filing date is required
A divisional application number is required
Divisional application number has invalid format
submission.basicfiliginfo.businessrule.e: An European Patent filing date is required
An European Patent application number is required
European Patent application number has invalid format
submission.basicfiliginfo.businessrule.m: An European Patent application number is required
European Patent application number has invalid format
submission.basicfiliginfo.businessrule.u: The user reference contains invalid characters
The user reference can contain a maximum of 25 characters
The draft submission will be saved with the latest valid reference
submission.basicfiliginfo.businessrule.t: A title of invention is required
The title of invention can contain a maximum of 512 characters
submission.basicfiliginfo.businessrule.l: The language of grant is required
submission.basicfiliginfo.businessrule.g: The Protection of data checkbox has to be checked
submission.parties.businessrule.required: At least one party is required
submission.parties.businessrule.confirme: At least one confirmed party is required
submission.parties.businessrule.epmploye: Employee not allowed if there is not an applicant legal entity
submission.parties.businessrule.contact-: Only one contact person can be added
submission.parties.businessrule.applican: The total ownership percentage should not exceed 100%
The total ownership percentage should be exactly 100%
Only one applicant can have a correspondence address

In case an application is filed in the name of more than one applicant, only the first applicant may indicate a postal address, provided that the first applicant acts as common representative for all applicants.
The NPO will send notifications to an address for correspondence only if no professional representative is or must be appointed.
submission.parties.businessrule.employee: An employee can only be defined if the first applicant is a legal entity
submission.parties.businessrule.company-: Are you sure you want to add this applicant? The company name is identical to the applicant's name
submission.attachments.businessrule.desc: An attachment of type description is required
submission.attachments.businessrule.powe: An attachment of type "Power of representation" is required
submission.payment.businessrule.account-: The account number and the name of the account holder are required
submission.payment.businessrule.deposit-: Please select at least one fee if you wish to pay by deposit account
submission.payment.businessrule.indicate: Please do not select fees if you wish to pay later
submission.payment.businessrule.bank-tra: Please select at least one fee if you wish to pay by bank transfer
submission.payment.businessrule.credit-c: Please select at least one fee if you wish to pay by credit card
submission.declaration.businessrule.exhi: The exhibition date cannot be earlier than 6 months prior to the filing date
The exhibition date cannot be earlier than 6 months prior to the priority date
